author: jonesde
msg: Added ProductCategoryLink entity and supporting seed data

author: mriou
msg: Being smarter about memory management. First the process definitions (OProcess) aren't loaded at startup but are lay loaded at the first request instead. Second a process reaper can be enabled to disassociate (dehydrate) processes according to a specific policy. The default policy controls both the time to live and the total number of processes held in memory. Processes are then rehydrated on demand.
